description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ahcb7","text":"This is an overview of all protocols currently in use for the GE/URMC/SCH Cell DIVE collaboration for the Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP). It includes links to each of the individual protocols that make up this project workflow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1abf","text":"Confirm donor acceptance criteria for inclusion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nsie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bq7l6","text":"URMC | Donor Acceptance Criteria for GE/URMC HuBMAP Inclusion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":61}],"data":{}},{"key":"9khqj","text":"URMC | COVID+ Donor Acceptance Criteria for GE/URMC HuBMAP Inclusion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":68}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BCD951103A7711EBA13EEF18BAE45AE9","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bjuxknxn"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A95951C098D211EC93C8AF2AEC05580A","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4zpqx5n"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a517b","text":"Prepare paraffin blocks and FFPE sections from tissue samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af5ek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o393","text":"URMC | Whole Lung and Lobe Processing - Formalin Fixation and Gross Sectioning of Tissue Samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":96}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ns64","text":"URMC | Parrafin Embedding and Sectioning of FFPE Lung Tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":60}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6608E0503FCF11EBA23051D819A7E428","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.biz7kf9n"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7BDE2BB03FCF11EBA23051D819A7E428","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bjtuknnw"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8aak","text":"Deparaffinize and rehydrate slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei71r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23tsn","text":"Cell DIVE™ Platform | Slide Clearing and Antigen Retrieval","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":58}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A5AFBCC03F0B11EBA23051D819A7E428","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bpwumpew"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c69bi","text":"Characterize antibodies (primary/secondary, direct conjugates, and zenon labelled antibodies) and determine any antigen effects from the Cell DIVE dye inactivation process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l4ha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ps9b","text":"Cell DIVE™ Platform | Antibody Characterization for Multiplexing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":64}],"data":{}},{"key":"d1586","text":"Cell DIVE™ Platform | Antibody Staining \u0026 Imaging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":49}],"data":{}},{"key":"d1sn0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F76D66C03FD811EBA23051D819A7E428","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bpyxmpxn"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E79E18203F0B11EBA23051D819A7E428","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bpv6mn9e"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq7o6","text":"Prepare direct conjugates for study.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pmmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c68r9","text":"Cell DIVE™ Platform | Antibody Purification Chemistry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":53}],"data":{}},{"key":"5cuiu","text":"Cell DIVE™ Platform | Ab Conjugation: Initial Conjugation \u0026 Scale up Conjugation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":80}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B637CC6060FB11EB8259433AAA74A127","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bpx9mpr6"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C28EFA6060FB11EB8259433AAA74A127","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bp55mq86"}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4koh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pqd4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cld6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ag71","text":"Staining is done using the Leica Bond MAX and images are acquired on the IN Cell Analyzer 2200.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
